subject: [Ip-health] Summer F/T Position- Universities Allied for Essential Medicines
body:
--
--
[ Picked text/plain from multipart/alternative ]
UAEM is searching for a full-time Access Metrics Initiative
Coordinator for summer 2007. The
goal of the Access Metrics Initiative is to develop metrics that
accurately measure and incentivize university practices promoting
access to technologies derived from university research. A background
in intellectual property, biotechnology, management consulting or
other relevant fields is preferred but not required.

Interested potential candidates should submit their CV and a cover
letter to UAEM Access Metrics Initiative c/o David Scales at
david.scales@yale.edu.

See attached document for more information about the position and UAEM.


--
[ Access Metrics Initiative coordinator description.doc of type application/msword deleted ]
